column4: If I set the videoram higher, would it make games run better? I have 1gig of ram and I think I can spare some.
an onboard card? a laptop i assume?
an onboard card yes. Nope, not a laptop.
it's not worth it imo, just buy a seperate card, upgrading the mboard if necessary.  but i guess it depends on what sort of games
what do you mean "not worth it, buy a separate card"... I don't want to buy any new hardware, that costs money where I'm from..
well, most onboard cards are to put it simply: crap for games
but like i said, depends on the game
i have/had the same problem.  your apt cache is getting deleted.  apt-get update.
i haven't confirmed this fix yet, but you may want to remove 'apt' from /etc/cron.daily
i just did that recently, nad hopefully the seemingly scheduled deletions will stop
so just "sudo apt-get update" ?
yes, or reload using synaptic
but it will probably keep happening ...
which is why i'm trying out this cron deletion
has this been bugzilla'd?
not afaik.  besides me, you are one of two who i've seen had the same prob
well I'm always in here if my computer is on, which is ideally 24/7... please pm me if you hear anything else
will do.  hopefully this cron thing works
ping
fkuxbox is popular
just try them out i say...easy enough to remove if you don't like them
ideally... had a bad experience trying out kde
me too
